title: Sal Gabrini 3: Hard Love
description: Business tycoon and sexy heartthrob Sal Gabrini works hard to maintain his numerous business ventures and his long-distance relationship with his super-sexy African-American girlfriend. Marriage is in the cards, but he knows that branding her with the Gabrini name could become more of a curse than a blessing. But when a woman from his past asks for his help, and it nearly costs him his life, he and Gemma must rethink their entire relationship and if their love is strong enough to endure his tumultuous and often dangerous lifestyle. In the latest installment of Sal and Gemmaâ€™s romantic story, the interracial couple discovers that the lessons of love can come at a very serious price.
author: Mallory Monroe
